name: Gang Inc. - Idle Tycoon Game
description:
Can you run the gangster world and build Mafia Empire. Gang Inc is a new, fun, and exciting Idle game. Upgrade your factory, grow weed, gather stolen goods, invite new gang members, open new areas, train with guns at the shooting range, invent new chemicals, and much more. Become rich and grow your business incrementally.

Gang Inc combines familiar Idle game mechanics and unique realistic 3d animations. Run your Empire better than everybody else and have fun!

Contact us if you have any questions or suggestions.
